name: FUSEIDEAS
tagline: Great Ideas Are Born To Perform
description:
Fuseideas is a full-service advertising and creative agency driven by measurable results. Namely, award-winning work with a laser focus on ROI. We believe in the power of ideas. Ideas that make our clients measurably better whether they’re seeking relevance, growth or longevity. Or all three. 
With a full-time staff of over 60 employees, our offices are located in Boston, New York, Atlanta, Portland, ME, Lexington, KY, and Prague. Our client list ranges from Fortune 500 businesses to small and innovative companies with a focus in higher education, travel and tourism, cable and entertainment, and technology. 
Whether you’re looking for a full-service agency to handle all of your advertising and marketing needs or a digital agency for designing and developing interactive web-based or mobile solutions, we are ready to make you measurably better.
